metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000037 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple reachable assertions in the PDF parser allow an attacker to cause a denial of service (assert crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000037` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.13.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.13.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.0+ds1-1').
